author: Special Correspondent
text:
Chief Minister Jayalalithaa inaugurated the new campus for School for Excellence in Law under the Tamil Nadu Dr. Ambedkar Law University built at a cost of Rs. 59 crore at Perungudi-Kottivakkam on Monday.

The buildings, with a built-up area of 2.69 lakh sq. metre spread over 25 acre of land were inaugurated through video conferencing by the Chief Minister, an official release stated.

Ms. Jayalalithaa had earlier announced in the floor of the Assembly that a new campus for the university would be constructed. The School for Excellence in Law under Tamil Nadu Dr. Ambedkar Law University is presently functioning from a small campus measuring 4.82 acre on Greenways Road.

The new campus has air-conditioned classrooms, digitised library, computer centre for 180 students, a collection of over 50,000 books, digital library, conference halls, hostel rooms and the campus is wi-fi enabled.
title: CM inaugurates new campus for Law University
